short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get a QR Code for the page you're currently on.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get a QR code for the current page in your browser.

Click the extension, snap a pic with your phone, and you'll have the page on your phone for sharing or viewing. If you've ever had to type a long URL in mobile browser or jump through email hoops, you'll probably appreciate the simpler workflow.
